metadataAttributes.Title: Data Science with R - Capstone Project
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: In this capstone course, you will apply various data science skills and techniques that you have learned as part of the previous courses in the IBM Data Science with R Specialization or IBM Data Analytics with Excel and R Professional Certificate.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Data Science,R Programming,Data Visualization (DataViz),Linear Regression,Exploratory Data Analysis,
